title: Expo Android Build executor
description: Build and sign a standalone APK or App Bundle for the Google Play Store

clearCredentials.description: Clear all credentials stored on Expo servers.

publicUrl.description: The URL of an externally hosted manifest (for self-hosted apps).

skipWorkflowCheck.description: Skip warning about build service bare workflow limitations.

sync.description: Syncs npm dependencies to package.json (for React Native autolink). Always true when --install is used.
